feed.title: Nextcloud Talk Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v20.1.5
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix(calls): Improve call related system messages in one-to-one conversations #14468
  • fix(search): Include caption messages in search results #14552
  • fix(conversation): Stay in chat when removing a group or team the moderator is a member of #14396
  • fix(chat): Correctly start loading the chat when the lobby is removed #14518
  • fix(dashboard): Hide lobbied conversations from the dashboard #14611
  • fix(calls): Further improve false positives when showing the connection warning #14449
  • fix(calls): Fix guest displayname when exporting call participants #14631
  • fix(reminder): Log when generating a reminder failed #14617

What's Changed

* [stable30] fix(conversation): Only trigger event with users that really got removed by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14396 * build(deps-dev): Bump @babel/core from 7.26.7 to 7.26.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14425 * build(deps-dev): Bump @babel/preset-env from 7.26.7 to 7.26.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14427 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14437 * [stable30] Fix distributing staged stats when not updated three times in a row by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14449 * [stable30] ci: Adjust to changed guests app branching by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14453 * [stable30] fix(call): Show "Missed call" in one-to-one also when "End for everyo… by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14468 * build(deps-dev): Bump @nextcloud/eslint-config from 8.4.1 to 8.4.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14479 * build(deps): Bump libphonenumber-js from 1.11.19 to 1.11.20 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14480 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14487 * [stable30] fix(conversations): whitelist event object type by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14512 * build(deps-dev): bump ts-jest from 29.2.5 to 29.2.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14537 * build(deps): bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.19 to 9.2.20 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14538 * [stable30] fix(RoomFormatter): expose lastReadMessage if user is in the lobby by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14518 * [stable30] fix(search): Include captions in message search by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14552 * [stable30] fix: add script to generate core types (from shipped apps) by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14581 * build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/event-bus from 3.3.1 to 3.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14596 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.20 to 9.2.21 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14597 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.123 to 7.0.125 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14598 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14604 * [stable30] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14607 * [stable30] fix(lobby): Hide lobbied conversations from dashboard by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14611 * [stable30] fix(reminder): Log when generating the reminder didn't work by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14617 * [stable30] fix(calls): Fix displayname when exporting call participants by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14631 * Release 20.1.5 by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14635

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v20.1.4...v20.1.5

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v21.0.1
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix(calls): Improve call related system messages in one-to-one conversations #14495
  • fix(search): Include caption messages in search results #14553
  • fix(chat): Show loading spinner when requesting AI chat summary #14625
  • fix(chat): Correctly start loading the chat when the lobby is removed #14517
  • fix(dashboard): Hide lobbied conversations from the dashboard #14612
  • fix(federation): Fix broken participant avatar when federated instance is down #14573
  • fix(conversation): Fix participant list change when the menu for a participant is open #14564
  • fix(calls): Fix guest displayname when exporting call participants #14630
  • fix(reminder): Log when generating a reminder failed #14618

What's Changed

* [stable31] fix(call): Simplify wording for one-to-one calls by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14495 * [stable31] [l10n]: Change apostrophe by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14505 * [stable31] fix(LeftSidebar): do not expand empty search bar when focused by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14504 * [stable31] fix: replace moment objects comparison by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14509 * [stable31] fix(MessagesList): rename method to pollNewMessages by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14508 * [stable31] fix(conversations): whitelist event object type by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14513 * [stable31] fix(MessagesList): fix resizeObserver and scrolledToBottom state update by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14516 * [stable31] fix(MediaDevicesSelector): refactor, allow audio output by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14520 * build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/event-bus from 3.3.1 to 3.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14532 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.123 to 7.0.124 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14534 * build(deps): Bump vue-tsc from 2.2.2 to 2.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14531 * build(deps-dev): Bump ts-jest from 29.2.5 to 29.2.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14535 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.19 to 9.2.20 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14533 * build(deps): bump cuyz/valinor from 1.14.3 to 1.14.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14536 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14539 * [stable31] fix(RoomFormatter): expose lastReadMessage if user is in the lobby by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14517 * [stable31] fix(search): Include captions in message search by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14553 * [stable31] fix(breakout-rooms): Hide breakout-room config when already configured by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14555 * [stable31] feat(App): add escape shortcut to go to root by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14543 * [stable31] chore(openapi): Update openapi-extractor to allow deprecations and co… by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14563 * [stable31] fix(Participant): unexpected change of participant to be removed and users can ban themself by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14564 * [stable31] fix(AvatarWrapper): fix img display property, provide fallback icon on failed src load by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14573 * [stable31] fix: add script to generate core types (from shipped apps) by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14580 * [stable31] fix(update/openapi): do not skip PR creating on workflow by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14582 * [stable31] fix(Views): migrate to ts by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14568 * [stable31] fix(openapi): move from full-json to separate files by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14577 * build(deps): Bump vue-tsc from 2.2.4 to 2.2.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14587 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.124 to 7.0.125 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14588 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.20 to 9.2.21 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14589 * [stable31] fix(openapi): add types from files/openapi.json by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14600 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14602 * [stable31] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14606 * [stable31] fix(conversationsService): migrate to ts by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14609 * [stable31] fix(lobby): Hide lobbied conversations from dashboard by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14612 * [stable31] chore(openapi): Update openapi-extractor to 1.5.1 to fix openapi-full.json by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14615 * [stable31] fix(reminder): Log when generating the reminder didn't work by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14618 * [stable31] fix(Message): show loading spinner when request chat summary by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14625 * [stable31] fix: migrate fileSharingServices to TS by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14622 * [stable31] fix: expose 'createConversation' method by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14626 * [stable31] fix(calls): Fix displayname when exporting call participants by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14630 * Release 21.0.1 by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14636

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v21.0.0...v21.0.1

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v19.0.15
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix(calls): Do not reset previous connected users after resuming in a call #14735
  • fix(sidebar): Show tooltips when Talk is in the sidebar #14697
  • fix(guests): Fix style and labels on public share page as a guest #14720 #14726
  • fix(calls): Skip password verification for guests that are reconnecting to the call #14787
  • fix(calls): Fix leaving call if a signaling message is received while reconnecting #14788

What's Changed

* [stable29] fix(l10n): Fix translation source strings by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14641 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.125 to 7.0.126 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14659 * [stable29] fix: show tooltips in sidebar (from Vue directive) by @Antreesy in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14697 * [stable29] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14709 * [stable29] style: drop redundant overrides for public shares by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14726 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.126 to 7.0.127 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14740 * [stable29] fix: public share style and guest actions fixes by @Antreesy in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14720 * [stable29] fix: Do not reset previous users after a resume by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14735 * [stable29] fix(RoomController): skip password verification for guests that are reconnecting to the call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14787 * [stable29] Fix leaving call if a signaling message is received while reconnecting by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14788 * chore(release): Prepare 19.0.15 by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14784

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v19.0.14...v19.0.15

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v20.1.6
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix(calls): Do not reset previous connected users after resuming in a call #14735
  • fix(sidebar): Show tooltips when Talk is in the sidebar #14697
  • fix(guests): Fix style and labels on public share page as a guest #14720 #14726
  • fix(calls): Skip password verification for guests that are reconnecting to the call #14787
  • fix(calls): Fix leaving call if a signaling message is received while reconnecting #14788

What's Changed

* [stable30] fix(l10n): Fix translation source strings by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14639 * build(deps-dev): Bump @babel/core from 7.26.9 to 7.26.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14657 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.21 to 9.2.22 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14656 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.125 to 7.0.126 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14658 * [stable30] fix(call): revert hard-fix within conversation navigation by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14647 * [stable30] fix(i18n): minor string fixes by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14719 * [stable30] fix(PollViewer): hide intermediate results from anonymous polls by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14723 * [stable30] style: drop redundant overrides for public shares by @Antreesy in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14721 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.22 to 9.2.23 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14749 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.126 to 7.0.127 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14750 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14756 * [stable30] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14758 * [stable30] fix: Do not reset previous users after a resume by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14736 * [stable30] fix(federation): Heal request order for slow federation connections by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14769 * [stable30] fix(RoomController): skip password verification for guests that are reconnecting to the call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14785 * [stable30] ci: Fix guests app branch by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14793 * [stable30] Fix leaving call if a signaling message is received while reconnecting by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14789 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14805 * [stable30] fix(chat): Fix preloading the last chat message with the room query by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14810 * [stable30] fix(LeftSidebar): conversation subline hardening by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14818 * [stable30] fix(Flow): adapt to registration fixes at workflowengine by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14823 * [stable30] fix(chat): Fix end-of-call showing "missed call" sometimes in one-to-one by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14832 * [stable30] feat(conversations): Allow to not request the last message when getting rooms by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14834 * [stable30] fix(chat): Don't look for some more hardcoded guests by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14816 * [stable30] fix(performance): Improve performance with many file shares as last m… by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14830 * [stable30] Release 20.1.6 by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14841

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v20.1.5...v20.1.6

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v21.0.2
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix: Improve performance of conversation list #14811 #14779 #14777 #14775 #14774 #14831
  • fix: Improve performance when rendering system messages #14817
  • fix: Improve performance when searching for conversations #14734
  • fix(chat): Fix missing reactions on own messages while posting #14695
  • fix(guests): Allow guests to reload the page without re-entering the password #14786
  • fix(federation): Fix calls when federated server receive messages in wrong order #14770
  • fix(calls): Fix call after resuming connection #14737
  • fix(calls): Fix wrongly showing "Missed call" in one-to-one conversations #14833
  • fix(calls): Fix videos in the last row being cut off #14692
  • fix(calls): Prevent screen from turning off during calls #14733
  • fix(settings): Fix initial state of end-to-end-encrypted calls setting #14693
  • fix(events): Automatically confirm the calendar event for the organizer #14762
  • fix(workflows): Adjust workflow registration to new mechanism #14823
  • fix(polls): Hide intermediate results from anonymous polls #14724

What's Changed

* [stable31] fix(l10n): Fix translation source strings by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14640 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.125 to 7.0.126 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14660 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.21 to 9.2.22 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14663 * build(deps-dev): Bump @babel/core from 7.26.9 to 7.26.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14662 * build(deps): Bump ua-parser-js from 2.0.2 to 2.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14661 * [stable31] fix(call): revert hard-fix within conversation navigation by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14648 * [stable31] fix: update @nextcloud/vue file imports by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14674 * [stable31] fix: migrate from deprecated OC.dialogs.confirmDestructive by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14691 * [stable31] fix(Grid): fix cropped videos in the last row by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14692 * [stable31] fix(AdminSettings): respect initial state of E2EE setting by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14693 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14708 * [stable31] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14710 * [stable31] fix(PollViewer): hide intermediate results from anonymous polls by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14724 * [stable31] fix(messages): fix missing instant reactions for own message by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14695 * [stable31] feat: reduce items rendering in left sidebar search results by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14734 * [stable31] fix(call): prevent screen from turning off during call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14733 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.126 to 7.0.127 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14752 * build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/cdav-library from 1.5.2 to 1.5.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14751 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.22 to 9.2.23 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14753 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14755 * [stable31] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14759 * [stable31] fix(calls): Fix system message for unanswered call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14761 * [stable31] fix: do not add organizer as attendee and set status by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14762 * [stable31] fix: Do not reset previous users after a resume by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14737 * [stable31] fix(a11y): provide missing aria-labels to buttons with no visible text by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14768 * [stable31] fix(federation): Heal request order for slow federation connections by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14770 * [stable31] fix(performance): Parse file shares inaccurately to prevent setupFS by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14774 * [stable31] feat(conversations): Allow to not request the last message when getting rooms by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14775 * [stable31] fix(shares): Fix lightweight share condition for CardDAV files by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14777 * [stable31] feat(conversations): do not request last message when in compact mode by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14779 * [stable31] fix: improve string handling by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14764 * [stable31] chore(deps): bump nextcloud/vue from 8.23.1 to 8.24.0 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14781 * [stable31] fix(RoomController): skip password verification for guests that are reconnecting to the call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14786 * [stable31] ci: Fix guests app branch by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14792 * [stable31] Fix leaving call if a signaling message is received while reconnecting by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14790 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14804 * [stable31] fix(chat): Fix preloading the last chat message with the room query by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14811 * [stable31] fix(LeftSidebar): conversation subline hardening by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14819 * [stable31] fix(chat): Don't look for some more hardcoded guests by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14817 * [stable31] fix(Flow): adapt to registration fixes at workflowengine by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14824 * [stable31] fix(performance): Improve performance with many file shares as last m… by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14831 * [stable31] fix(chat): Fix end-of-call showing "missed call" sometimes in one-to-one by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14833 * [stable31] ci: Generate authoritative classmap again by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14843 * [stable31] Release 21.0.2 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14840

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v21.0.1...v21.0.2
